mapper.select: select c.ch_no , c.ch_mem_nm , c.ch_role_nm , c.ch_role , c.ch_mem_th_nm , to_char(c.ch_regdt , 'YYYY.MM.DD') ch_regdt , to_char(c.ch_cnntdt , 'YYYY.MM.DD') ch_cnntdt , m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_email , m.mem_prflimg , m.mem_ph , m.mem_addr1 , m.mem_addr2 , m.mem_pst_cd , m.mem_intr from channel_member c left outer join member m on c.mem_no = m.mem_no where c.ch_no = #{chNo} and m.mem_no != #{memNo} order by ch_mem_th_nm desc, ch_role asc
